name: treated
desc: True if the water has been decontaimated by boiling it
raw: (treated ?water - water) ; True if the water has been decontaimated by boiling it

name: groove
desc: True if a small groove is made in wood to start a fire
raw: (groove ?wood - wood) ; True if a small groove is made in wood to start a fire

name: at
desc: an object is at a location
raw: (at ?obj - object ?loc - location) ; an object is at a location

name: inventory
desc: an item is in the players inventory
raw: (inventory ?player ?item) ; an item is in the players inventory

name: connected
desc: location 1 is connected to location 2 in the direction
raw: (connected ?loc1 - location ?dir - direction ?loc2 - location) ; location 1 is connected to location 2 in the direction

name: has_water_source
desc: this location has a source of fresh water.
raw: (has_water_source ?loc - location) ; this location has a source of fresh water.

name: has_wood
raw: (has_wood ?loc - location) ; this location has a wood

name: can_light_fire
desc: this location is safe for lighting a fire
raw: (can_light_fire ?loc - location); this location is safe for lighting a fire

name: has_fire
desc: this location has a fire going
raw: (has_fire ?loc - location); this location has a fire going

name: has_shelter
raw: (has_shelter ?loc - location); this location has a shelter

name: has_friend
desc: the player has found a survivor
raw: (has_friend ?survivor - survivor); the player has found a survivor

name: has_escaped
desc: the player has built a raft and left with his fellow survivors
raw: (has_escaped ?player - player) ; the player has built a raft and left with his fellow survivors

name: at_ocean
desc: see if a location has access to the ocean
raw: (at_ocean ?loc - location) ; see if a location has access to the ocean

name: is_safe
desc: see if a location is safe to make shelter on
raw: (is_safe ?loc -location) ; see if a location is safe to make shelter on

name: has_fish
desc: see if location has fish to catch
raw: (has_fish ?loc - location) ; see if location has fish to catch

name: cooked
raw: (cooked ?item - item) ; see if item is cooked
